effect.@en: When these creatures are encountered, roll 1D6 Chaos Die. If the result is face ‘1-4’, they carry two Wytchfyre pistols. If the result is face ‘5’, they carry a Wytchfyre jezzail. If the result is face ‘6’, they carry a Wytchfyre thrower. While carrying a Wytchfyre thrower, they cannot Charge, Maneuver or Run.
